stories.Title: Meta's LLaMA 2 is here!
stories.Description: Now open-source and freely available for commercial use, this transformer-based language model offers enterprises an exciting alternative in the world of generative AI.
stories.Tweet: Meta's LLaMA 2 is here! 📦 Now open-source and freely available for commercial use, this transformer-based language model offers enterprises an exciting alternative in the world of generative AI.  #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/facebook-parent-meta-unveils-llama-2-open-source-ai-model-for-commercial-use/

stories.Title: Qualcomm teams up with Meta
stories.Description: Qualcomm is introducing on-device AI capabilities to high-end phones and PCs in 2024, powered by Meta's LLaMA 2. Offering advanced productivity and entertainment experiences to users.
stories.Tweet: Qualcomm teams up with Meta 📦 Qualcomm is introducing on-device AI capabilities to high-end phones and PCs in 2024, powered by Meta's LLaMA 2. Offering advanced productivity and entertainment experiences to users. #ai https://www.androidauthority.com/qualcomm-meta-on-device-ai-phones-2024-3346204/

stories.Title: Big news from Microsoft Inspire
stories.Description: The company has revealed pricing for Microsoft 365 Copilot, their GPT-4-powered suite of tools. For just $30 per user, businesses will be able to generate Office content effortlessly.
stories.Tweet: Big news from Microsoft Inspire 📦 The company has revealed pricing for Microsoft 365 Copilot, their GPT-4-powered suite of tools. For just $30 per user, businesses will be able to generate Office content effortlessly. #ai https://www.engadget.com/microsoft-will-charge-businesses-30-per-user-for-its-365-ai-copilot-153042654.html

stories.Title: Microsoft moves forward
stories.Description: The Microsoft-Activision Blizzard merger deadline has been extended to October 18. The companies are working diligently to finalize the deal, taking into account regulatory considerations.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft moves forward 📦 The Microsoft-Activision Blizzard merger deadline has been extended to October 18. The companies are working diligently to finalize the deal, taking into account regulatory considerations. #microsoft https://www.digitaltrends.com/gaming/microsoft-activision-nlizzard-deadline-extension/

stories.Title: The countdown begins…
stories.Description: NASA's Psyche spacecraft is prepping for its epic journey to unravel the mysteries of a metal-rich asteroid and shed light on planetary evolution.
stories.Tweet: The countdown begins… 📦 NASA's Psyche spacecraft is prepping for its epic journey to unravel the mysteries of a metal-rich asteroid and shed light on planetary evolution. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/jpl/nasa-s-psyche-mission-enters-home-stretch-before-launch

stories.Title: NASA's lunar shadow explorer
stories.Description: VIPER, a specialized rover, is getting ready to explore the dark polar craters of the moon. This mission aims to find ice deposits that could support future human exploration.
stories.Tweet: NASA's lunar shadow explorer 📦 VIPER, a specialized rover, is getting ready to explore the dark polar craters of the moon. This mission aims to find ice deposits that could support future human exploration. #NASA https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/nasa-starts-building-ice-hunting-moon-rover/

stories.Title: BepiColombo unveils a mystery
stories.Description: Scientists have discovered that Mercury, with its minimal atmosphere, showcases magnificent auroras after all. Thanks to electron precipitation at the planet's surface.
stories.Tweet: BepiColombo unveils a mystery 📦 Scientists have discovered that Mercury, with its minimal atmosphere, showcases magnificent auroras after all. Thanks to electron precipitation at the planet's surface. #ESA https://interestingengineering.com/science/bepicolombo-probe-electron-precipitation-auroras-mercury

stories.Title: Carl Pei’s approach to gadgets
stories.Description: The Nothing Phone 2 is here, and it's all about being a GOOD phone, according to Carl Pei. But his ambitions don't end with smartphones; he aims to revolutionize the tech industry itself.
stories.Tweet: Carl Pei’s approach to gadgets 📦 The Nothing Phone 2 is here, and it's all about being a GOOD phone, according to Carl Pei. stories.Title: Apple’s Vision Pro meets Unity
stories.Description: With the beta version of its development platform for visionOS, PolySpatial, developers can build captivating 3D experiences.
stories.Tweet: Apple’s Vision Pro meets Unity 📦 With the beta version of its development platform for visionOS, PolySpatial, developers can build captivating 3D experiences. #apple https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/19/unitys-apple-vision-pro-game-development-tool-opens-in-beta/

stories.Title: Nissan joins the NACS revolution
stories.Description: By becoming the first Japanese automaker to adopt Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS) starting in 2025. Nissan proves its commitment to making electric mobility more accessible.
stories.Tweet: Nissan joins the NACS revolution 📦 By becoming the first Japanese automaker to adopt Tesla's North American Charging Standard (NACS) starting in 2025. Nissan proves its commitment to making electric mobility more accessible. #nissan https://electrek.co/2023/07/19/nissan-first-japanese-automaker-teslas-nacs/

stories.Title: Introducing: Lazygit
stories.Description: Struggling with Git's complexity? With Lazygit, it becomes user-friendly, allowing you to focus on your work without hassle.
